name: Mirrored Chaos
description:
For a game jam we have created a third person wave base game that is set in an fantasy arena.  The theme was permanent death and "you can control the player ".

The objective is to survive long as possible and to kill the different kind of enemies. And reach the highest score possible. 

This project was completed in under a week.

Enjoy the game and criticism is welcome!
